name: B&B Hotel Ravenna

reviews.text: I stayed here one night while on a two week trip to Italy and this was my favourite hotel. It's very similar to an American Holiday Inn. Hotel was new, clean, and very modern. It is however, outside of town and too far away to walk anywhere. I did not eat at the dinner at the hotel, because I though it was pricey - 20 euros for dinner. The breakfast was good though - even had American cereal. Would gladly stay here again.
reviews.title: Great American Style Hotel

description: Il B&B Hotel Ravenna (Ex. Classhotel Ravenna) si trova a pochi minuti dalla città antica, principale arteria di collegamento con l’autostrada e le più belle attrazioni turistiche della riviera romagnola. Perfetto ad esempio per visitare parchi tematici come Mirabilandia, che dista solo qualche minuto.
